product_name: CamelBak Delaney Hydration Waistpack - 21 fl. oz.
long_description: Stay hydrated on training runs or walks with the CamelBak Delaney hydration waist pack. Delaney Fit includes a 21 fl. oz. CamelBak Podium(R) Chill water bottle. Podium bottle features the self-sealing JetValve(TM) cap that eliminates spills; JetValve lets you sip from any direction or squirt to cool off on a hot day. Perforated foam back panel keeps you comfortable and ventilated when the activity level rises. Zippered pocket holds your energy bars, cash, keys and music player; includes a key clip. Front and back reflective trim keeps you visible in low light.
short_description: Stay hydrated on training runs or walks with the CamelBak Delaney hydration waist pack.
